  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    mru.game.model.Player
    getPlayer(String name, boolean makeNew)
    getter method for a player from the players ArrayList if no player is found a new one is created
    ArrayList<mru.game.model.Player>
    getTopPlayers()
    creates a new ArrayList of Player Sorts through players ArrayList and adds to the topPlayers ArrayList 0 index is top score, scores decrease as index increases ties are added to the list
    void
    loadData()
    Called by constructor Loads data from Casino.txt into an ArrayList
    void
    runGame()
    creates a new puntoBancoGame calls puntoBancoGame methods for results of the game and to set instance variables calls methods from menu that was created in showMenu() method to display results
    void
    save()
    writes to the file object that was created in the constructor if written successfully it will display so if not written successfully it will display error
    void
    showMenus()
    called by constructor creates new menu object calls different menu methods to display different menus different menu methods return ints that correspond with a method in the game manager

      public GameManager()

  • Method Details

    • loadData

      public void loadData()
      Called by constructor Loads data from Casino.txt into an ArrayList

    • getPlayer

      public mru.game.model.Player getPlayer(String name, boolean makeNew)
      getter method for a player from the players ArrayList if no player is found a new one is created
      Parameters:
      name - , returned from calling menu.enterName()
      Returns:
      a Player, either new and added to the players ArrayList or fetched from the players ArrayList

    • getTopPlayers

      public ArrayList<mru.game.model.Player> getTopPlayers()
      creates a new ArrayList of Player Sorts through players ArrayList and adds to the topPlayers ArrayList 0 index is top score, scores decrease as index increases ties are added to the list
      Returns:
      a sorted ArrayList based on wins

    • save

      public void save()
      writes to the file object that was created in the constructor if written successfully it will display so if not written successfully it will display error

    • showMenus

      public void showMenus()
      called by constructor creates new menu object calls different menu methods to display different menus different menu methods return ints that correspond with a method in the game manager

    • runGame

      public void runGame()
      creates a new puntoBancoGame calls puntoBancoGame methods for results of the game and to set instance variables calls methods from menu that was created in showMenu() method to display results
